articles.author: By Travis Caldwell and Kelly McCleary, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Highland Park shooting at July 4 parade in Illinois
articles.description: A suspect is in custody, police say, after at least six people were killed in a shooting in downtown Highland Park, Illinois, in the area of a July Fourth parade. Follow here for the latest live news updates.
articles.content:
Suspected gunman Robert Bobby Crimo III posted online music videos he apparently made that featured ominous sounding lyrics and animated scenes of gun violence. 
In one video titled Are you Awake, C… [+1729 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: July 4 parade slaughter again shows nowhere is safe from America's mass killing contagion
articles.description: America's latest mass shooting turned a cherished July Fourth parade from a scene of patriotic joy into one of fear and death.

articles.title: Video shows the moment shots fired during Highland Park parade - CNN Video
articles.description: A video shows the moment shots were fired into a Fourth of July parade in Highland Park, Illinois, which resulted in dozens injured and at least six dead.

articles.author: Rosa Flores, Jacqueline Rose and Alexa Miranda, CNN
articles.title: 'I'm terrified I might be here forever': Brittney Griner pens handwritten letter to Biden
articles.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner, in a handwritten letter to President Joe Biden, said she fears she will be detained in Russia indefinitely and pleaded with the President not to forget about her and other American detainees.

articles.author: Megan Thomas
articles.title: Rachel Brosnahan 'sick' over shooting in her hometown of Highland Park
articles.description: Actress Rachel Brosnahan is expressing her grief over the mass shooting in Highland Park, Illinois on Monday that has left at least six people dead and dozens more injured.

articles.author: Jason Hanna, Adrienne Broaddus and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: 'People just falling and falling': Witnesses describe terror at Illinois parade shooting
articles.description: Zoe Pawelczak's dad thought the repetitive pops ringing out at Highland Park's Fourth of July parade Monday morning were part of the show, she says. But she felt something was off.

articles.title: 'Like a battle zone': Witness describes scary moment shots rang out at Highland Park parade - CNN Video
articles.description: A number of people were killed at a July 4th parade in Highland Park, Illinois, Highland Park police announced in a press conference. The suspect remains at large. CNN's Adrienne Broaddus talks to Zoe Pawelczak, a parade attendee who was present as the shooti…

articles.title: Live updates: Suspect in custody after Highland Park, Illinois, July 4th parade shooting
articles.description: A person of interest is in custody, police say, after at least six people were killed in a shooting in downtown Highland Park, Illinois, in the area of a July 4th parade. Follow here for the latest live news updates.
articles.content:
An uncle of the man taken into custody in connection with the shooting told CNN he saw no warning signs that would prompt him to believe his nephew would have been involved in such a tragedy.

articles.description: At least six people have been killed in a shooting in downtown Highland Park, Illinois, in the area of a July 4th parade, and dozens have been injured, authorities said. Follow here for the latest live news updates.
articles.content:
City authorities held a second news conference Monday afternoon to give an update on the mass shooting that left at least six people dead during a July 4th parade in Highland Park, Illinois.

articles.author: George Ramsay, CNN
articles.title: Nick Kyrgios and Stefanos Tsitsipas fined after fiery Wimbledon match
articles.description: Nick Kyrgios and Stefanos Tsitsipas have both been fined following their fiery third-round match at Wimbledon on Saturday.
